name: TVTopShelfSectionedItem.ImageShape
desc: Constants indicating the aspect ratio of an image.

items.name: case square
items.desc: An image with a 1:1 aspect ratio.

items.name: case poster
items.desc: A poster-shaped image with a 2:3 aspect ratio.

items.name: case hdtv
items.desc: An image with a 16:9 aspect ratio.
